# Visualizations
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggsci)
training_data <- read_csv("training_data.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(training_data, aes(
    x = pmax(as.numeric(admin_time_since_admission), 1))) +
    geom_density(aes(fill = cdiff_30d_flag), alpha = 0.6) +
    scale_x_log10() +
    scale_fill_aaas()
```
